features: ENHANCED FOR SPORTSWEAR: Dropps Active Wash Laundry Detergent Pods are infused with advanced odor control technology, targeting and neutralizing tenacious body odor, perspiration, sweat and body oils. They ensure your active attire, from athletic gear to athleisure, remains fresh, maintaining the pristine condition of performance fabrics through every wash. They're also perfectly suited for your regular laundry, ensuring a deep clean across your entire wardrobe.

THOUGHTFULLY FORMULATED: Opt for Dropps Laundry Detergent Pods and benefit from a meticulously crafted detergent with 55% USDA Certified BioBased content. Our pods are formulated with advanced cleaning agents and enzymes for a powerful wash that’s gentle on clothes and suitable for sensitive skin. The precision of our pre-measured pods ensures the right amount of detergent for any load size, promoting an effective and efficient cleaning process.

FOR ALL MACHINES & WASH CYCLES: Our detergent is the epitome of laundry convenience. Formulated for universal use, these pods are compatible with all washing machine types—HE, standard, front, and top-loading—providing efficiency across all water temperatures, including cold cycles for energy conservation. The unit dose pods offer an effortless, spill-free, and mess-free solution for any load size, ensuring your laundry routine is as simple as it is effective.

LOW WASTE PACKAGING: Our recyclable cardboard boxes are a testament to our commitment to smart living. They're designed to be space-efficient, fitting neatly into limited storage areas, ensuring your home stays uncluttered. Trust Dropps for an effective wash, a tidier laundry room, and a package that's considerate of both your living space and broader environmental well-being.

A COMPANY YOU CAN TRUST: We have over 20 years in crafting advanced cleaning solutions and an enduring commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. As a B Corp certified entity, we embody the highest standards for social and environmental performance, transparency, and accountability. We take pride in our stringent standards for product development and manufacturing, all within the USA, ensuring a positive effect on our customers, the community, and the environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice washing pods, gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: They get the job done as far as cleaning the clothes, no scent, no allergic reactions. Seems, natural and organic. Simple, pop them in the washer, good to go. Great quality washing pods, using them with ease and simplicity. Great for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: Great for sensitive skin in a very eco friendly packaging, this is my families favorite laundry soap. It cleans the clothes well without being stinky or leaving scummy residue. they've been able to concentrate the soap even further than when I first started purchasing from them, making an even smaller pod that still gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are easy to use, take up much less space in the cabinet than the big plastic jugs, and get the job done well. Also foolproof for kids doing their own laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Have to use extra pods
reviews.reviewText: I have been trying to be greener-- this is the second one I've tried that doesn't come in a huge plastic container. I have always used the smell test to see how clean my laundry is. If I just use 2-4 pods my clothes smell ok out of the washer but after being dried they still smell dirty. I have to use 5-6 pods in my old high efficiency front loader. The clean smell doesn't last very long. But at least what I wear smells ok at the end of the day, and, the towels are ok after one use. I have an 11 year old already very stinky boy and it gets rid of his funk. I was using scent boosters since the other brand also didn't have much of a scent (I used 2 sheets per load of the other brand and at least they didn't smell dirty) but this detergent wipes that out. I like that the container they come in is recyclable cardboard. The sheets came in a lined paper box and we don't have that type of recycling where I live. So I'm questioning the value but I still like it.Addendum: I noticed it works better in hot water. I generally wash in cold or warm, again, to be more environmentally conscious, but in cold this detergent is weak.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for babies with sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: My LO has very sensitive skin and these are great. I never find these partially dissolved like I do with my tide pods. I love the light scent. We used the unscented for a while but I caved and tried the scented and I don't regret it. Just a soft clean smell. Does a great job getting out the normal stains but we do use a spot treatment for formula/ blowout stains

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty.
reviews.reviewText: The pods themselves are very small, but will very effectively clean a large load. The scented pods are not overpowering like a lot of other detergents and leave no residue. Very well done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work as well as conventional laundry soap
reviews.reviewText: With fewer chemicals that could irritate one's skin. I like it and I prefer fewer chemicals that are not necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these because of a recommendation and so happy I did. I am sensitive to detergents and soaps and so glad to find something without the perfumes and other non-essential additives to get my clothes clean. I highly recommend getting these. Btw, I also ordered their foaming hand soap with is scented but does not overwhelm me or cause any allergic reactions. Great products, both.
